original_text: The glory of the Lord dwelt on Mount Sinai, and the cloud covered it six days. And on the seventh day he called to Moses out of the midst of the cloud.
korean_text: 여호와의 영광이 시내 산 위에 머무르고 구름이 엿새 동안 산을 가리더니 일곱째 날에 여호와께서 구름 가운데서 모세를 부르시니라

sentences.original_text: The glory of the Lord dwelt on Mount Sinai
and the cloud covered it six days.
sentences.korean_translation: 구름이 그것을 여섯 날 동안 덮었더라

sentences.original_text: he called to Moses out of the midst of the cloud.
